website_summaries.verdict: This battery-powered model offers up to 90 minutes of emergency illumination. With no need for wiring, installation is the simplest of any model we considered.
pros: Simplicity of installation is a key benefit of this model
Since the unit is battery powered, all that is required is mounting the housing to the wall or ceiling
Backup battery will automatically switch to internal battery power in an emergency situation and stay lit for up to 90 minutes
Unit includes a bi-color indicator light to alert users of the battery level
cons: The housing is not as thick as some other units, especially around the headlights, which may crack or come off more easily than some models

customer_reviews.title: Barely adequate
customer_reviews.text: Barely adequate Chinese made Grade C product, BUT assembled adequately and works as advertised. It is very flimsy so great care must be taken to get it all put together and mounted without breaking the cheap plastic, but once it is installed, it lights up and the emergency lights come on when the power fails. Perfect for getting through a Fire Dept. inspection, but I wouldn't trust my life with it under any circumstances. All told, worth the $29 paid, but not a penny more.
customer_reviews.author: Fluglowe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than replacing batteries in the old light system.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works. Meets code. Replacing the batteries in the old sign/light unit would have cost appr $50. This is cheaper, lasts longer, and doesn't need to be activated every month to keep batteries exercised. This retired fire marshal likes it!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryNC

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a wall-mounted emergency exit sign. Easy to install and good quality for the money. The one I replaced didn't have the emergency lights, which is why I went wit this one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JC74074

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Our insurance company required we added these, and my husband installed it himself. He is quite handy and had it installed in no time. It looks great, and will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: redwhiteandblue

customer_reviews.title: You may need adapter for installation
customer_reviews.text: The sign needed to be hung on the wall, above the entrance door of my studio, but my electrician had to find a special adapter piece that made the connection into the light possible. It looks ok. Its not actually white, but a very light grey color. The side lights are not super powerful, but do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: I don't need my exit signs to be anything special just get the job done at a good price and that's what this does
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality but it does the job. I don't need my exit signs to be anything special just get the job done at a good price and that's what this does. Bought one at HD for $80 and was feeling like I got ripped off and sure enough I checked amazon and found this for less than half.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 of these and just installed them and one of them is defective. It is outside of the return window now so we are stuck with it. The others work fine.

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to install.  Lies, all lies!
customer_reviews.text: My husband, a mechanic (who puts things together every single day) hates this product with the fury of a thousand suns. He installed it 30 minutes ago, and is still mad about it.

customer_reviews.title: The EXIT letters light up good when the power is on
customer_reviews.text: The EXIT letters light up good when the power is on. However, when you press the Test button the EXIT letters and the side led lights fail to turn on. The manual says that it takes 24 hrs for the batteries to charge, its been 3 days and the batteries still do not work. Do not buy this product and do not rely on an emergency on this thing.

customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until the red wire (says for 220v) touched something on the circuit board and fried it...caused the white leds to stay on constantly then they died after a few hours. Anyway the wires should not be stripped from the factory IMHO. Ordered another....lesson learned :)

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Emergency/exit lighting at the brick and mortar store was crazy expensive so I decided to look online. Glad I did - I was able to buy 5 of these for less than the price of 2 locally! Being LED I'm glad we won't need to worry about bulbs for the foreseeable future. They are smaller than others I've seen but totally adequate. It would be really helpful if there were more knockouts, especially one in the top since it has the option for top-mounting. But otherwise I have no complaints.

product_meta.title: All LED Decorative Red Exit Sign & Emergency Light Combo with Battery Backup
product_meta.description: Size Name:1 PackIllumination: Adjustable long lasting, efficient ultra-bright white LED lamp heads. One, 0.5 watt white LED per lamp head.Unique all inclusive lamp, reflector and lens assembly.Long-lasting, energy efficient Red or Green LED exit sign illumination. Electrical: Dual 120V/277 voltage standard. Unique bi-color LED indicator light alerts occupant on battery condition (green-normal, red-check battery). 3.6V long-life, maintenance-free, rechargeable Ni-Cad battery. Internal solid-state transfer switch automatically connects the internal battery to LED board and LED lamp heads for minimum 90-minute emergency illumination. Fully automatic solid-state, two-rate charger initiates battery charging to recharge a discharged battery in 24 hours. Remote capacity option available. Mounting: EZ-snap thermoplastic mounting canopy included - provides top or end mount. Universal K/O pattern on back plate for wall mount. Housing: Injection-molded, engineering-grade, 5VA flame retardant, high-impact, thermoplastic in white or black finish.
feature_bullets: Long-lasting, energy efficient red led exit sign illumination
Unique bi-color led indicator light alerts occupant on battery condition
Internal solid-state transfer switch automatically connects the internal battery to led board and led lamp heads for minimum 90-minute emergency illumination
Fully automatic solid-state, two-rate charger initiates battery charging to recharge a discharged battery in 24 hours
Ez-snap thermoplastic mounting provides top or end mount

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars475 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
